title: Ovulation Calculator
description: Calculate your ovulation date and fertile window
metaDescription: Free ovulation calculator - Predict your ovulation date, fertile window and most fertile days of the month. Ideal for family planning.

form.title: Enter your information
form.lastPeriodLabel: First day of your last period
form.lastPeriodHelp: Date of the first day of your last menstruation
form.cycleLengthHelp: Average length of your cycle (typically 28 days)

info.title: About the Ovulation Calculator
info.description: This calculator predicts your ovulation date and fertile window based on your last period and cycle length. Ovulation typically occurs 14 days before the next period. The fertile window includes the 5 days before ovulation and the day of ovulation.
info.formula: Formula: Ovulation date = First day of last period + (Cycle length - 14 days)
info.limitations: Note: This calculator provides estimates based on averages. Cycles can vary from person to person and month to month. For greater accuracy, consider using ovulation monitoring methods such as basal temperature or ovulation prediction kits. Always consult with your doctor for family planning.
